text: tatha jab pahunchata hai manushy ko koee duhkh to pukaarata hai apane paalanahaar ko, dhyaanamagn hokar usakee or. phir jab ham use pradaan karate hain koee sukh apanee or se, to bhool jaata hai use, jisake lie vah pukaar raha tha isase poorv tatha bana leta hai allaah ka saajhee, taaki kupath kare usakee dagar se. aap kah kaden ki aanand le le apane kufr ka, thoda sa. vaastav mein, too naarakiyon mein hai
